title: Video Editor - Real Estate
job_overview:
We're seeking a talented and experienced Part-Time Video Editor (hourly rate: $7) to join our social media team. In this exciting role, you'll play a vital role in crafting visually stunning video content that elevates our VIPs brand presence and engagement across various social media platforms. You will be handling multiple VIPs within a team.

Only applicants who follow the instructions will be considered.

Familiarity with the luxury real estate industry is a plus! Having a background in this industry will allow you to create content that connects with those interested in luxury real estate.

Key Skills & Qualities:
Proven Video Editing Expertise: Minimum 3 years of experience editing both short-form and long-form videos with exceptional efficiency.
Software Proficiency: Mastery of Adobe Premiere Pro or a similar industry-standard video editing software is essential.
Eye-Catching Thumbnails: Design compelling thumbnails that grab viewers' attention and increase click-through rates on social media platforms.
Platform Optimization: Maintain a strong understanding of the latest algorithms for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and email marketing platforms. Optimize videos for each platform to maximize reach and engagement.
Staying Ahead of Trends: Stay current on the latest social media trends and seamlessly integrate them into your video editing to maintain fresh and relevant content.
SEO & Video Ranking: Understand the importance of SEO optimization for video content to improve search ranking. Effectively utilize keywords, tags, and descriptions.
Data-Driven Approach: Analyze the performance of published videos and translate insights into actionable strategies to refine future content. Familiarity with analytics tools like YouTube Analytics, Google Analytics, and other social media platforms is a plus.
Branding Champion: Grasp branding best practices and ensure consistent integration of branding elements into videos to strengthen brand identity. Create videos that exude luxury, sophistication, and a professional yet relatable tone.
Teamwork Makes the Dream Work: Experience working within a remote team is essential, including clear communication and coordination with social media managers

Requirements:
Must have an Onlinejobs.ph account to track the hours and should have answered the English Grammar Test, DISC Personality Test, and the IQ Test
At least 2 years of experience working as a Video Editor, having experience with Real Estate is a plus
Excellent English speaking and writing
Computer or laptop, preferably with a backup
Internet is a must with backup
Amenable to do weekly meetings with the client
